column4: anyone know of a good audio mixing/editing program besides stupid audacity that's not working
you might also say why audacity isn't working... it's actually pretty good
yes i know it's great, but the freaking sound doesn't play on mine, it works perfectly on windows!
well, if audacity isn't working, it's likely a sound issue. there are no real absolutes there; you might just try poking around in preferences->audio
